text: Need James Wilson for David Jones campaign. Budget around $4,743, looking for 1 x 90-second product demo, 1 x Live stream, 3 x LinkedIn post, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x 3-minute vlog. 9 week exclusivity from other fashion brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 5 months.
